column3: Student was upset at peer for laughing and said peer was teasing. He charged at peer
column4: writer blocked him and attempted to calm him. He wouldn't calm and became physically aggressive
column5: so support was called and writer implemented 1-person child restraint. Support walked student to hall.

column3: X X X X X X was being disruptive of the academic process. was asked to take a break and refused. Support was called. started to rip cords out of sockets and was being unsafe. Support staff removed M.B. from classroom. continued to be unsafe in the hallway and support put into a small child.
X X X T.O. time was refusing to do his ELA work and stated he was leaving school. continued to escalated and was being unsafe. was escorted into a T.O..

X Time-out: Escort was upset about something that occurred in PE. He went into the fishbowl and was unsafe by climbing on things and in the windows. He was asked to get down and then had to be escorted to the T.O. where he continued to escalate and struggle. He was finally able to callm

X time out: 12:05-12:25 Physical interventions (small child and escort) 5 min. was in the bird's nest. He began throwing food and objects at He was place in a small child and then escorted to the time out room. He was spitting on staff. Eventually he calmed and went to the cool down room.
